page.title: 14CLUBS.
page.content: One of the clubs in Bovey Tracey for boys aged 8 to 10 years, is the Cub scouts.In cubs, at the beginning, we have to work for a badge.If you wanted your artist badge you would have to draw a picture. You have to get three arrows, the bronze arrow, siver arrow, and the gold arrow. At the age of 10\ cubs go up to scouts. This is for boys up to the age of 16 yrs. The scouts have more adventures. They go camping, absailing, rock climbing and many other activities. Other clubs include a youth club at Hennock, and in Bovey Tracey, the Boys Brigade, Guides and Brownies, and Tracey Troopers.There are also many clubs for adults. The Rotary club, Bovey Belles(dancers),Bovey Wives, Mother's Union,Rotaract,and The Conservative Club etc.
